summary: Completed testing of image display fix and social sharing features. All features working correctly. Backend /api/files/{path} endpoint serves images with proper CORS headers. Share button and ShareIcons components working on public project pages and landing page.

issues:
Description shows raw HTML tags: '

A shared garden project...'

passed_tests: Backend: Health endpoint returns healthy status
Backend: /api/files/{path} serves images with correct Content-Type (image/png)
Backend: /api/files/{path} includes CORS headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *, Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: cross-origin)
Backend: /api/files/{path} returns 404 for non-existent files
Backend: /api/files/{path} blocks path traversal attempts
Backend: /api/public/projects lists public projects with image paths
Backend: /api/public/projects/{id} returns project with image path
Backend: /api/public/projects/{id}/blog returns blog entries
Backend: /api/public/projects/{id}/library returns library entries
Backend: /api/public/projects/{id}/gallery returns gallery data
Backend: Login with admin credentials returns access_token
Backend: Login with invalid credentials returns 401
Backend: Authenticated /api/projects returns user projects
Backend: Authenticated /api/projects/{id} returns project with image
Backend: Authenticated /api/projects/{id}/gallery returns gallery
Frontend: Landing page loads correctly
Frontend: Public projects section displays project cards
Frontend: Backyard Garden image displays correctly on landing page (naturalWidth: 1536)
Frontend: Image URL uses /api/files/ endpoint for CORS support
Frontend: ShareIcons (Twitter, Facebook, Copy) appear on project cards (9 icons for 3 projects)
Frontend: Public project detail page loads correctly
Frontend: Project header image displays correctly on public project page
Frontend: Share button appears on public project page
Frontend: Share dropdown shows Twitter/X, Facebook, LinkedIn, Email, Copy Link options
Frontend: Copy Link functionality triggers (clipboard API requires permissions in headless)
Frontend: Login flow works with admin credentials
Frontend: Secure projects page displays project cards
Frontend: Backyard Garden image displays correctly on secure projects page
Frontend: Gallery page loads and displays images correctly
action_items:
MINOR: Fix HTML tag display in Community Garden description on projects page (shows '

A shared garden...' instead of rendered text)
critical_code_review_comments: getImageUrl utility function correctly converts /uploads/ paths to /api/files/ for CORS support
ShareButton component properly implements all social sharing options with data-testid attributes
ShareIcons component provides compact sharing UI for project cards
/api/files/{path} endpoint includes proper security check to prevent path traversal
seed_data_creation: Used existing Backyard Garden project (ID: 5cea0f68-77e6-462b-8cc6-2128f0f300e1) with cover image for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Image display fix is complete. The /api/files/{path} endpoint serves uploaded files with CORS headers. Frontend uses getImageUrl() utility to convert /uploads/ paths to /api/files/ paths. Social sharing features (ShareButton and ShareIcons components) are implemented with Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Email, and Copy Link options. All share elements have data-testid attributes for testing.
